overview: Riuh tells the story of a group of residents in an alley in the corner of Jakarta who were given socialization to be aware of the virus. Although this pandemic has claimed many victims, there are still a number of parties who doubt the existence of this virus that spreads, one of which is through touch.

production_companies.name: Komite Penanganan COVID-19 dan Pemulihan Ekonomi Nasional (KPCPEN)

title: Riuh
